channel.title: Comments on: Hot Or Not Meets Webdesign

item.title: By: EasyLifeTerm.com
item.dc:creator: EasyLifeTerm.com
item.description: When marketing on the internet, I want and need a design to stand out and these galleries fit the bill. My designer encouraged me to look at your stuff, I’m glad he did. Thanks again for the great article.
item.content:encoded: When marketing on the internet, I want and need a design to stand out and these galleries fit the bill. My designer encouraged me to look at your stuff, I’m glad he did. Thanks again for the great article.

item.title: By: CSS Gallery

item.description: Nice detailed list! we ask that you consider including http://CSSGallery.com in your resource listing. Cheers!
